snippet: Two of the three major indexes declined in spite of good reports on manufacturing, spending and construction.
abstract: Stocks decline slightly as encouraging economic data fails to lift markets after three consecutive days of gains; investors remain hesitant ahead of April employment report.
lead_paragraph: Two of the three major indexes declined in spite of good reports on manufacturing, spending and construction.

headline.main: Three-Day Rally Ends, Despite Positive News
headline.print_headline: Three-Day Rally Ends, Despite Positive News
